cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to -1 (negative port) will cause invalid port configuration error and F1 connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSlots to -1 (negative value) will cause invalid TDD configuration error and frame structure failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSlots 設定為 -1（負值）會導致無效 TDD 配置錯誤，並造成幀結構失敗。
